metadata.synopsis: In case only 2 gnomes from Act1/2 made it to Act3, this gnome is added inside Ironhand basement.

0.speaker: Gipkins Jared
0.text: Unless you've got any spare silver ingots, you can piss right off.
0.context: NodeContext: Irritated at being interrupted by the player

1.speaker: Gipkins Jared
1.text: Don't bother - you look like the pig iron sort to me.
